<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/api-keys/scopes"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get available scopes grouped logically for portal interface.

Returns scopes organized by resource type and permission level
for easy integration with the portal's API key management interface.

This endpoint uses cached data loaded from YAML at startup for fast access.
Scopes are currently global and not organization-specific.

  parameters={undefined}
